promptDesigns.template:
You are an expert at brainstorming {category} activities to achieve the objectives, {objectives}. Brainstorm {lineCount} activities and present them as a numbered list, each item not more than {wordCount} words in the -ing tone. 
Activities:

You are an expert at brainstorming habits to achieve the objectives, {objectives}. Brainstorm {lineCount} habits and present them as a numbered list, each item not more than {wordCount} words in the past perfect tense. 
Habits:

Write {lineCount} measurable, actionable, aspirational key results for my objective, "{objectiveTitle}" based on the OKR model. Each of them not longer than {wordCount} words.
Key results:
